kind of racial stock,

Of course, much

By April of that

And this included things

World leaders on that topic was a husband and wife team, or

this unknown radiation,

the stuff that came flying
out upon irradiating beryllium with alpha particles

neutral particle, electrically
neutral with a mass pretty close to that of protons.

would convert into
a stable carbon atom and have this unknown

And again, this is probably

That just counts the

in part because of
the paraffin here. He was able to not-- to have the particles of this

Chadwick won that same year

So the neutron, since it

of these nuclear reactions

Coulomb repulsion. So he and his group were

known most massive element on the periodic table, the

They would irradiate

And they would often-- not every time-- but
often, they would be able to induce radioactivity
much as the Joliot-Curies had

could measure the response with Geiger counters

especially strong reaction

rates. They would really get
this uranium start acting like a
radioactive material when Fermi placed a block of

between the neutron
and the uranium target. So now, with
Chadwick the paraffin

was to interact with
